info.title: Yoda Speak
info.description:
Turn your sentences and webpage into Yoda-speak!  Credits to http://www.yodaspeak.co.uk/ for providing this service.

This API is a test in progress, and still sitting on a dev sandbox.  Things might break quite often.

parameters.name: sentence
parameters.description: Input sentence to turn into Yoda-speak
